long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Verve AI Chrome Extension is an integral part of the Verve AI web application, designed to enhance your coding interview experience by providing real-time coding assistance. This extension does not function independently and requires an active Verve AI account.

How to Use:

1.Sign Up or Sign In:
https://www.app.vervecopilot.com/copilot
Visit the Verve AI web application.
Sign up for a new account or sign in to your existing account.

2.Launch a Coding Interview Session:
Once logged in, start a coding interview session from your dashboard.

3.Navigate to the Coding Question:
During the interview, go to the page where the coding question is presented.

4.Activate the Chrome Extension:
Click on the Verve AI Chrome Extension icon in your browser toolbar.
The extension will process the coding question, and the suggested answer or guidance will be available momentarily.

Note: This extension is a companion tool for the Verve AI web application and will not provide functionality outside of an active session on the Verve AI platform.
